title: Map values from another table and replace them in vba excel
body:
I have 2 sheets in excel. The first sheet has many columns out of which one is "Category" and the second sheet consist of a table with some values. I want to find values in the column category and replace them with the column name from next sheet.

example:In sheet1:
Column A
Category
ABC
123
A1
A2C
SDF
876

In sheet2:
ColumnA   ColumnB   ColumnC
Alphabet    Number    Alpha-num
ABC            123            A1
SDF            876            A2C


I want to replace the values in category column in Sheet1, to replace with column header(eg:"Alphabet","Number","Alpha-num") in Sheet 2 , using mapping of table in sheet 2. Example: If in sheet1: category is ABC, it will find that value in Sheet2, it is under Alphabet, so the value "Abc" will be replaced with "Alphabet".

Please help me with finding and mapping this.. and replacing the values also.
